column5: does anyone know the ice conditions in windemere the 1st of january is aproaching fast and i normally make it first trip of the year would be greatfull to get any info thanks

I thought you meant Lake Rosseau....    From all that I've heard, I'm guessing it's a no-go...sorry to say I won't be up there this year.  Try calling Bait on the Lake @ (705) 765-1600  He will give you the inside scoop
sorry about the spelling johnny im a tourist as im sure you can guess but thanks for the advice just a bit cuatious about going out without some local knowledge thanks again wee scot
